comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pdalbhan

comments.content: Need to add a conditional import for systems that do not have distutils.extra, since distutils.extra only adds the i18n setup.py commands....
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content:
Hello,

 I'm new to Openstack/Nova, but I am getting this exact error. Trying to install on CentOS 5.6, and following all the OS specific instructions on openstack's site. 

 Is there a workaround I can implement now to get this running? 

 Thank you,

Markus
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mwells-wphr

comments.content: @Markus: yes, you can try to apply the patch from https://code.launchpad.net/~jaypipes/nova/bug771489/+merge/59135
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: I ran into this same problem trying to build Nova on Red Hat 6.1 (x86_64) regardless of having python-distutils-extra = 2.19 installed.  Removing python-distutils-extra and applying the referenced patch (https://code.launchpad.net/~jaypipes/nova/bug771489/+merge/59135) fixed the issue.  Are there differences between python-distutils-extra 2.18 and up that would have broken this?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mathrock
